raw.title: [BIP463] Enable D2D/rETH 80/20 Gauge [Arbitrum]
raw.author: 0x9f74662aD05840Ba35d111930501c617920dD68e
raw.body:
### PR with Payload
https://github.com/BalancerMaxis/multisig-ops/pull/587

**Summary:**
> This proposal aims to activate a 2% capped gauge for an 80% D2D / 20% rETH pool on the  Arbitrum Network. PrimeDAO is collaborating with Protofire to become the first project to launch on the veLaunchpad. Ahead of a veD2D launch and new product iterations around the veLaunchpad, PrimeDAO wants to move a significant share of its liquidity to an 80% D2D / 20 % rETH pool on Aribtrum. Moving away from USDC as the primary counter-asset of the D2D tokens - will better tie Prime’s success to the industry's success and, by having a YBA involved, also generate more value for LPs and Balancer alike. 


**References/Useful links:**

> Website: https://www.prime.xyz/
Github Page: https://github.com/PrimeDAO
Forum: https://forum.prime.xyz/

**Protocol Description:**

> PrimeDAO is a DAO-builder collective building tools for DAO to DAO coordination. PrimeDAO has launched multiple products and spin-offs, including Prime Rating, Prime Launch (including a Balancer LBP launcher), Prime Deals, SupremeDAO, and Inverter Network.

**Motivation:**

> This pool is an important step towards launching veD2D on top of the veLaunchpad created by Protofire by starting to move liquidity from the current main pool (D2D/USDC on Mainnet) to this new D2D/rETH pool on Arbitrum. The Prime and Protofire teams are collaborating on having PrimeDAO as the first project to launch on the solution.  Launching a rETH pool on Arbitrum helps PrimeDAO position for the next cycle by moving away from USDC as the primary counter-asset. Prime is building new products to live around the veLaunchpad to create value for ve8020 projects. 

**Specifications:**

> **1. Governance:** PrimeDAO is governed by holders of D2D and pooled D2D, through Snapshot Votes and Forum Proposals. 
> **2. Oracles:** None, we use Coingecko.
> **3. Audits:** The Prime Launch and Prime Deals dApp [are audited.](https://github.com/PrimeDAO)
> **4. Centralization Vectors:** Treasury functions are controlled by Prime Governance. Contracts are non-upgradable.
> **5. Market History:** D2D has generated over $70,000 in Trading Fees on Balancer since its LBP launch in Q4 2021. Currently, D2D has a total depth of about ~250k on Balancer.
>
> **Gauge address:** 0x2D02Bf5EA195dc09854E18E7d2857A16bF376963
 
**Specification:**

> The Balancer Maxi LM Multisig **eth:0xc38c5f97B34E175FFd35407fc91a937300E33860** will interact with the **GaugeAdderv4** at **0x5DbAd78818D4c8958EfF2d5b95b28385A22113Cd** and call the **addGauge function** with the following arguments:
gauge(address): **0x2D02Bf5EA195dc09854E18E7d2857A16bF376963** which corresponds to the 2% capped gauge for this pool
gaugeType(string): Arbitrum

choices: No, this is not the way

raw.title: [BIP-320] Enable PAL/OHM 80/20 Gauge [Arbitrum]
raw.author: 0x9f74662aD05840Ba35d111930501c617920dD68e
raw.body:
### [PR with Payload](https://github.com/BalancerMaxis/multisig-ops/pull/251)

**Summary:**
Whitelist for veBAL voting [PAL-OHM: pool gauge ](https://app.balancer.fi/#/arbitrum/pool/0x8d333f82e0693f53fa48c40d5d4547142e907e1d000200000000000000000437)

**References/Useful links:**

https://www.paladin.vote/

https://doc.paladin.vote/

https://gov.paladin.vote/

https://twitter.com/Paladin_vote

**Protocol Description:**
Paladin is a governance lending protocol aiming to become the leading influence market and democratize activism.
Up to date, we have released a lending market for stkAave, as well as a vote incentive marketplace for Balancer, Curve and Bunni.

**Motivation:**
Paladin already has a tight history with Balancer. The PAL token was made transferable via an [LBP on Balancer via Prime Launch ](https://launch.prime.xyz/lbp/0x531BCa3d4c1a53f856d90B0D4461E1f6Bd648f6D). A Balancer pool on mainnet has been there since PAL has been liquid. Now that Paladin is moving on Arbitrum, we want to incentivize liquidity and attract more users in order for this pool to become our main hub of liquidity on Arbitrum. 

**Specifications:**

1. **Governance:** Paladin DAO is governed by holders of PAL, through snapshot votes and forum proposals.


### [Paladin DAO ](https://gov.paladin.vote/)


[https://signal.paladin.vote/#/ ](https://signal.paladin.vote/#/)

2. **Oracles:** None, we use Coingecko.
3. **Audits:**
All daps have been audited.
[Audits - Docs ](https://doc.paladin.vote/security/audits)
4. **Centralization vectors:** Treasury functions and smart contract proxy updates are controlled through a 5/9 multisig.
5. **Market History:** PAL was made transferable on Balancer via a dutch auction and now has liquidity on 3 DEXs on Ethereum (Balancer, Curve & Uniswap). PAL  has a total depth of ~1M$.

Gauge address: 0x6aB751De05eD2E0646a04b7f45677ce841e42Bea

**Specification:**

The Balancer Maxi LM Multisig `eth:0xc38c5f97B34E175FFd35407fc91a937300E33860` will interact with the `GaugeAdderv4` at `0x5DbAd78818D4c8958EfF2d5b95b28385A22113Cd` and call the `addGauge` function with the following arguments:

gauge(address): `0x6aB751De05eD2E0646a04b7f45677ce841e42Bea` which corresponds to the 2% capped gauge for this pool
gaugeType(string): `Arbitrum`

choices: No, this is not the way

raw.title: [BIP-477] Enable PSP/OP 80/20 Gauge with 2% emission cap [Optimism]
raw.author: 0x9f74662aD05840Ba35d111930501c617920dD68e
raw.body:
### PR with Payload
https://github.com/BalancerMaxis/multisig-ops/pull/614

**Summary:**
> Enable PSP/OP 80/20 A Night at the OPara Gauge on Optimism, with 2% BAL emission cap. 

**References/Useful links:**

> Link to:
    • Website https://www.paraswap.io/
    • Documentation https://www.paraswap.io/docs
    • Github Page    https://github.com/paraswap

**Protocol Description:**

> Paraswap is a DeFi aggregator that unites the liquidity of decentralized exchanges and lending protocols into one comprehensive and secure interface and APIs. The $PSP token is the governance token of Paraswap DAO. 

**Motivation:**

> This pool has been the main liquidity of PSP on optimism and recently the Paraswap governance has passed [the proposal](https://snapshot.org/#/paraswap-dao.eth/proposal/0x7c720fc7f9a239115cfe92261074e896266d113a0d0f245808fb690337e4df4e) to further bootstrap PSP liquidity using Aura and Balancer / Beethoven X on Optimism. The BAL gauge would be crucial for this. 

**Specifications:**
 
1. **Governance:** Paraswap governance is through PSP holders. 
 
3. **Audits:**  see [audits](https://www.paraswap.io/#home-audits)

4. **Centralization vectors:** No. 

5. **Market History:** The PSP/OP pool has been established on optimism for more than 7 months. 
 
6. **Value:** The pool is the primary liquidity of PSP on optimism and the BAL gauge would help further bootstrap the liquidity. 

Pool: https://op.beets.fi/pool/0x0244b0025264dc5f5c113d472d579c9c994a59ce0002000000000000000000c9

Child Gauge: https://optimistic.etherscan.io/address/0x390E36102245EAc08E5b3D4527b30B3A645F16d7

Root gauge: https://etherscan.io/address/0x132296d1Dfd10bA55b565C4Cfe49D350617a2A2b#code

Specification:

The Balancer Maxi LM Multisig eth:`0xc38c5f97B34E175FFd35407fc91a937300E33860` will interact with the GaugeAdderv4 at `0x5DbAd78818D4c8958EfF2d5b95b28385A22113Cd` and call the addGauge function with the following arguments:
gauge(address):`0x132296d1Dfd10bA55b565C4Cfe49D350617a2A2b`
gaugeType(string): `Optimism`

choices: No, this is not the way

raw.title: [BIP-469] Enable BEETS/rETH gauge w/ 2% emission cap [Optimism]
raw.author: 0x9f74662aD05840Ba35d111930501c617920dD68e
raw.body:
### PR with Payload
https://github.com/BalancerMaxis/multisig-ops/pull/601


**Summary:**
> This is a proposal to enable BAL gauge for BEETS 80 / rETH 20 pool on optimism with 2% emission cap

**References/Useful links:**

> Link to:
    • Website https://op.beets.fi
    • Documentation https://docs.beets.fi/
    • Github Page https://github.com/beethovenxfi  
    • Twitter https://twitter.com/beethoven_x

**Protocol Description:**

> Beethoven X is a friendly fork of Balancer originated from Fantom back in 2021, and has been an essential part of the Balancer. It has been co-operating the Balancer deployment on optimism since 2022. $BEETS is the governance token of Beethoven X; on optimism, the token is bridged by Layerzero as a OFT. 

**Motivation:**

> This is to establish $BEETS liquidity on optimism. $BEETS token (the old multichain bridged version) has been used to incentivize liquidity through direct emission and voting incentives on optimism. The $BEETS token has recently been migrated to the Layerzero bridged version due to the multichain incidence (see [governance vote](https://snapshot.org/#/beets.eth/proposal/0xa3454614baec1abe0905d0abe6d1f08b53cae73879000dfcc8bd7c872419910c)). Hence, moving on the layerzero bridged version will be used. The pool will facilitate trading and holding of $BEETS on optimism. 

**Specifications:**
 
1. **Governance:** The BEETS governance is through maBEETS on fantom. 

2. **Oracles:** No

3. **Audits:** BeethovenX is a friendly fork of Balancer and has been [independently audited](https://docs.beets.fi/ecosystem/security). 

4. **Centralization vectors:** No

5. **Market History:** $BEETS token has a history for more than 2 years and is a well established token. 
 
6. **Value:** This pool will be the primary liquidity of $BEETS on optimism. The pairing with interest bearing $rETH would also earn protocol fees for Balancer. 


Pool address: https://op.beets.fi/pool/0xc1f46ce83439886f0ea9c21512b36e7e67239d2c000200000000000000000108

Child gauge: https://optimistic.etherscan.io/address/0x53bFf7a10181E4Fa2a92011dE9816220E0DaDd41

Root gauge: https://etherscan.io/address/0x20D03f9D0304744891881e6ac1D45b996e7F39B5#code

The Balancer Maxi LM Multisig eth:`0xc38c5f97B34E175FFd35407fc91a937300E33860` will interact with the GaugeAdderv4 at `0x5DbAd78818D4c8958EfF2d5b95b28385A22113Cd` and call the addGauge function with the following arguments:
gauge(address):`0x20D03f9D0304744891881e6ac1D45b996e7F39B5`
gaugeType(string): `Optimism`

choices: No, this is not the way

raw.title: [BIP-580] Enable sfrxETH / cbETH pool [Base]
raw.author: 0x9f74662aD05840Ba35d111930501c617920dD68e
raw.body:
### PR with Payload
https://github.com/BalancerMaxis/multisig-ops/pull/884

## Summary:

* This is a proposal to enable a Balancer gauge for a sfrxETH/cbETH pool on Balancer on Base.
* This will be a core pool.
* The pool has been launched [here](https://app.balancer.fi/#/base/pool/0x98bedb6a3c0b6feebbe662e6419481a6877d9681000000000000000000000104)

## References/Useful links:

Link to:

• [Website](https://frax.finance/)

• [Documentation](https://docs.frax.finance/)

• [Github Page](https://github.com/FraxFinance/frax-solidity)


## Protocol Description:

sfrxETH is a staked interest bearing version of FRAX’s staked ETH (frxETH). Coinbase Wrapped Staked ETH (cbETH) represents your staked Ethereum (ETH) in a tradable form. You can unwrap cbETH at any time. cbETH provides flexibility to sell, transfer, or use it. You can move cbETH to a personal wallet and trade it outside the Coinbase platform.

## Motivation:

As a joint effort with FRAX, we aim to increase liquidity of FRAX, sFRAX, frxETH, sfrxETH, to make Balancer a liquidity hub for Frax assets on Base. The BAL gauge and core pool status will facilitate the process.

## Specifications:

* Governance: FRAX governance process can be seen [here](https://docs.frax.finance/smart-contracts/governance) and their snapshot [here](https://snapshot.org/#/frax.eth).
* Oracles: Chainlink feed for rate can be found [here](https://data.chain.link/feeds/base/base/sfrxETH-frxETH).
* Audits: See [here](https://docs.frax.finance/other/audits)
* Centralization vectors: see [here](https://docs.frax.finance/frax-ether/overview).
* Market History: See [here](https://docs.frax.finance/frax-ether/frxeth-and-sfrxeth)
* Value: Balancer will earn the protocol fee on interest bearing sfrxETH and cbETH in the pool and so will LPs. The BIP-19 flywheel will incentivize TVL to grow here with trading volume and our staked ethereum pillars will continue to have Balancer as their ideal liquidity destination.

Link to pool: https://app.balancer.fi/#/base/pool/0x98bedb6a3c0b6feebbe662e6419481a6877d9681000000000000000000000104

Link to child gauge: [0x1cadBEFEB5461a671CfAAf5faC237aF00baC0B1c](https://basescan.org/address/0x1cadBEFEB5461a671CfAAf5faC237aF00baC0B1c#code)

Link to root gauge: [0x3CFfb5d5Db1dA8AA58908e54C03a7f8a7edb233c](https://etherscan.io/address/0x3CFfb5d5Db1dA8AA58908e54C03a7f8a7edb233c)

## Technical Specification:

The Balancer Maxi LM Multisig eth:0xc38c5f97B34E175FFd35407fc91a937300E33860 will interact with the GaugeAdderv4 at 0x5DbAd78818D4c8958EfF2d5b95b28385A22113Cd and call the addGauge function with the following arguments:

gauge(address): `0x3CFfb5d5Db1dA8AA58908e54C03a7f8a7edb233c`

gaugeType(string): `Base`

choices: No, this is not the way

decision.summary: The proposal seeks to enable a 2% capped gauge for an 80% D2D / 20% GYD pool on Arbitrum to enhance liquidity and volume. Voting timeline analytics show unanimous and early support for the 'Yes' option. Forum discussion is neutral but factual and informative. Historical similar proposals with strong 'Yes' support resulted in positive outcomes for Balancer pools.
key_arguments_for: Strong unanimous early voting support and stable timeline metrics favor the proposal.
PrimeDAO and Gyroscope collaboration is expected to increase volumes on Arbitrum pools.
Similar past proposals enabling new gauges have successfully increased pool volumes and trading fees.
The gauge is capped at 2%, limiting potential overexposure and risk.
key_arguments_against: No negative forum sentiment or significant opposition was observed, but some abstention options exist.
Market price and TVL impacts around the event showed a slight decline, suggesting some caution.

evidence.quote: Proposal aims to activate 2% capped gauge for 80% D2D / 20% GYD pool on Arbitrum to increase volumes.
Voting timeline shows 100% lead ratio and stability for 'Yes, let's do it' option across early voting.
Early voting ratio is 1.0 indicating strong early engagement.

available_choices: No, this is not the way
decision.ai_final_conclusion: Option 'Yes, let's do it' selected with stance to keep 'Change'.
decision.ai_final_reason:
- Unanimous and stable voting timeline metrics strongly support the proposal's adoption.
- Forum sentiment is neutral, factual, and aligned with the 'Yes' outcome, indicating community understanding and acceptance.
- Historical similar proposals to enable gauges have successfully increased liquidity and pool volumes, supporting the long-term health of Balancer.
- Slight negative market price and TVL impact observed around vote time advises cautious implementation but does not outweigh benefits.
- The recommendation mirrors the aggregated voting sentiment and balances forum neutrality with strong timeline analytics.
